00007       unsigned int i;
00008       unsigned int limit;
00009 
00010       limit = 1;
00011       for (i = 0; limit < num; limit = limit << 1, i++)
00012       ;

00015         cout<<"input= "<<num<<endl;
00016         cout<<"outPut= "<<i<<endl;
00017      return (i);
00018 }
